import sys
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
    bad = False
    for i in range(n):
        if a[i] > b[i] or (b[i] - b[(i + 1) % n] > 1 and b[i] != a[i]):
            bad = True
            break
    sys.stdout.write('NO\n') if bad else sys.stdout.write('YES\n')

def solve(n, A, B):
    for i in range(0, n):
        inext = (i + 1) % n
        a = int(A[i])
        b = int(B[i])
        anext = int(A[inext])
        bnext = int(B[inext])
        if a > b:
            return 'NO'
        if a < b and b > bnext + 1:
            return 'NO'
    return 'YES'
t = int(input())
for i in range(0, t):
    n = int(input())
    a = input().split(' ')
    b = input().split(' ')
    print(solve(n, a, b))

t = int(input())
for j in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    A = [int(a) for a in input().split()]
    B = [int(b) for b in input().split()]
    A.append(A[0])
    B.append(B[0])
    ans = 'YES'
    for i in range(n):
        if A[i] > B[i]:
            ans = 'NO'
            break
        elif A[i] == B[i]:
            continue
        elif B[i + 1] + 1 < B[i]:
            ans = 'NO'
            break
    print(ans)

for __ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print('YES' if all([b[i] >= a[i] and (b[i] == a[i] or b[i] <= b[(i + 1) % n] + 1) for i in range(n)]) else 'NO')

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    B = list(map(int, input().split()))
    B.append(B[0])
    res = 'YES'
    for i in range(n):
        if A[i] == B[i]:
            continue
        if A[i] > B[i]:
            res = 'NO'
            break
        if B[i + 1] < B[i] - 1:
            res = 'NO'
            break
    print(res)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = tuple(map(int, input().split()))
    b = tuple(map(int, input().split()))
    print('YES' if all((a[i] <= b[i] and (b[i] == a[i] or b[i] <= b[(i + 1) % n] + 1) for i in range(n))) else 'NO')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = tuple(map(int, input().split()))
    b = tuple(map(int, input().split()))
    print('YES' if all((a[i] <= b[i] and (b[i] == a[i] or b[i] <= b[(i + 1) % n] + 1) for i in range(n))) else 'NO')
